entry.dcterms:description: personal data, school career, professional career, opinion about the educational institution, livelihood, position, career evaluation up to the present

cross-section

50% of students graduated from Karl Marx University of Economics in 1954, 1968, 1973, or 1978, of the Department of Economy, Janus Pannonius University, Pécs in 1978, of the College of Finance and Accountancy, the College of Commerce and Catering Trade and from the College of Foreign Trade in 1973 and 1978.
face-to-face interview
A
